content: Il mondo fisico è una rete complessa di avvenimenti, e nulla accade per un’unica, semplice ragione.
translations: eng:The physical world is a complex network of events, and nothing occurs for only one reason
eng:The physical world is a complex web of events, and nothing happens for only one reason
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by rado (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
